titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2965) to amend the Small Business Act with respect to the Small Business Innovation Research Program and the Small Business Technology Transfer Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-192, by Mr. Polis (CO).

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. In lieu of the amendment recommended by the Committee on Science and Technology now printed in the bill, it shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Small Business now printed in the bill. During consideration of H.R. 2965, the Chair may reduce to two minutes the minimum time for electronic voting under clause 6 of rule XVIII and clauses 8 and 9 of rule XX.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 85.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 610.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 187 (Roll no. 480).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/7/2009--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2965) to amend the Small Business Act with respect to the Small Business Innovation Research Program and the Small Business Technology Transfer Program.
